author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Freedesktop is a very important development space in the FOSS world and world of Linux but it's important to remember that it's not a standards body, it's just a collection of standards.

==========Resources==========
Reddit Post: https://www.reddit.com/r/linux/comments/1kmfgid/rant_we_need_a_better_way_to_collaborate_on/
Freedesktop Specs: https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Specifications/
Gitlab Issue: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/xdg/xdg-specs/-/issues/205
